meanings.definition: A person who is excessively patriotic.
meanings.sent1: The superpatriots proudly waved the flag at every opportunity.
meanings.sent2: The superpatriots attended every national event to show their love for the country.
meanings.sent3: The superpatriots even painted their houses in the national colors!
meanings.sent4: The superpatriots' love for their country burned brighter than a thousand suns.
meanings.sent5: The image of the superpatriots saluting the flag was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: Those who exhibit extreme loyalty and devotion to their country.
meanings.sent1: In times of crisis, the superpatriots always stood up to defend their nation.
meanings.sent2: The superpatriots never hesitated to sacrifice for the well-being of their country.
meanings.sent3: The superpatriots' loyalty was so strong, they even named their pets after national heroes!
meanings.sent4: The superpatriots' devotion to their country was a beacon of inspiration for all.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the superpatriots singing the national anthem brought tears to many eyes.

meanings.definition: Individuals who display an intense love for their nation.
meanings.sent1: The superpatriots celebrated every national holiday with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The superpatriots' love for their nation was evident in every action they took.
meanings.sent3: The superpatriots' love for their country was so strong, they even wore flag-themed socks!
meanings.sent4: The superpatriots' hearts beat in sync with the rhythm of their nation.
meanings.sent5: The superpatriots' passion for their country was unmatched by anyone else.
